content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the municipal court of požega the case involved a coownership property specifically a piece of agricultural land the court ordered one party identified as dbr to pay the other party identified as br a certain amount of money as compensation for their coownership share the court also ordered the land registry department to register the ownership right of dbr the decision was based on the property act and involved a hearing expert appraisal and determination of the propertys value ultimately the court ruled in favor of dbr stating that the property should belong entirely to them additionally the petitioner was responsible for covering the costs of the proceedings
